title: Kahn - Storm's Eye
body:
**Kahn - Storm's Eye**

_Primary Role: Fighter
Secondary Role: Tank
Secondary Bar: Mana
_

> **[Change Log]**

> Tuesday (1/3/16) 
> - Added Range to Q: Hail Shower.
> - More information on E: Static Touch, changed spell information for active part of ability and added more information making it easier to understand.
> - Added Range to E: Static Touch.
> - Ultimate no longer stuns.

---

>  **Base Stats**
>   - Yet to be completed.

---

> **Lore**
> - Yet to be completed.

---

> **Passive - Storm Armour**
> 
> Kahn converts 35% of his ability power in to armour.
> - Example: 100 AP = 35 ARM

---

> **Q - Hail Shower **
> 
> Kahn conjures a small storm target area, showering hail upon his enemies, slowing enemies.
> 
> - Cooldown: 9 Seconds (45% CDR = 4.9 Seconds)
> - Cost: 50/55/60/65/70
> - Range: 600
> - Scale: Each Ball deals 50/60/70/80/90 (+ 60% MAX AP)
> - Slow: 10% drops off after 2 seconds, can stack up to 5
> 
> **[Notes]**
> - Example at max rank: 90 + (-15%)= 77 (-15%)= 65 (-15%)= 55 (-15%)- 47 (+60% MAX AP +35% MAX ARMOUR)
> - Each ball of hail that hit the same champion, subsequently loses 15% damage.
> - There are a total of 5 balls of hail that priorities enemy champions.
> - It is dodgeable and shows a small shadow where it will strike briefly before touching the ground.

---

> **W - Wind Funnel**
> 
> Kahn channels a huge gust of wind that pulls the wind in his direction. Moving enemies are slowed whilst stationary ones are pulled toward Kahn.
> 
> - Cooldown: 15 Seconds (45% CDR = 8.2 Seconds)
> - Channel: 2 Seconds (Can be interrupted)
> - Range: 800
> - Slow: 50% on moving enemies.
> - Staitionary enemies are pulled @ a speed = to 50% of Kahn's movement speed.
> 
> **[Notes]**
> - Can be interrupted by moving, Zhonya's Hourglass and Death.

---
> 
> **E - Static Touch**
> 
> Passively: While Static Touch is not on cooldown, Kahn gains a stack of Static; each stack gives him a small amount of resistance, max 7 stacks.
> Active: Kahn converts his static charges into a small ball of lightning that he can throw, stopping at the first target hit. Electrifying them for 3 seconds, electrified targets are damaged each second.
> 
> - Cooldown: 12 Seconds (45% CDR = 6.6 Seconds)
> - Cost: 65/70/75/80/85
> - Magic Damage per second: 10/15/20/25/30 (+40% AP)
> - Range: 600
> - Scale: 40/80/120/160/200 (+35% of MAX AP)
> - Bonus resistances: 15/20/25/30/35
> 
> **[Notes]**
> - Example at max rank: 1/2/3/4/5/6/7 second = 5/10/15/20/25/30/35
> - Upon hitting 7 stacks, if no ability is used after 3 seconds, the ability will start to decrease in stacks.
> - Once using this ability, you have 3 seconds to use any other abilities before the stacks drop off.
> - Enemies can see how many stacks you have + their is a visual effect.

---

> **R - Eye of the Storm**
> 
> Kahn conjures a massive storm that surrounds him, enemies within melee range of Kahn are uneffected, however those outside are slowed and if still inside the storm by the end are hit by a lightning bolt from the sky.
> 
> - Cooldown: 110/95/80 Seconds (45% CDR = 61/52/44 Seconds)
> - Cost: 100 Mana
> - Safe Range: 0 - 200
> - Danger Range: 201 - 1000
> - Slow: 20%
> - Magic Damage per/second: 50/100/150 (+25% MAX AP + 35% MAX ARMOUR)
> - Magic Damage at end: (50% MAX AP + 35% MAX ARMOUR)
> 
> **[Notes]**
> - Enemies that find them selves caught in this have to pick to either run toward or away from Kahn. If they run toward Kahn this can potentially lead to a disaster as the entire team can unload on top of everyone that was silly enough to run to the centre of his ability.

---

> **Full Build Example**
> -  {{item:3285}}  {{item:3157}} {{item:3025}} {{item:3001}} {{item:3512}} {{item:3158}} 
> - Ability Power = 270
> - Armour = 170 (+35 with max E)
> - Magic Resist = 110 (+35 with max E)
> - Best Outcome for Hail Shower: 334 (If all Hail hits) + 162 (60% AP) + 72 (35% ARMOUR w/ max stack Static) = 568 Damage.

---

> **Quotes**
> - Yet to be completed.

- First of all they rain from the sky similar to how hail does in real life.
- The hail is big enough to form a shadow on the ground for a brief moment before hitting the ground. Each hail smashes into the ground within quick succession of each other. In other words, a champion with plenty of mobility would easily counter this.
- I see how you see the similarities of gangplanks ultimate and Kahn's Q however it doesn't do anywhere near as much damage, it's easily dodgable and it's got a much small crash zone.
Other then that, I don't want to change the fundamental aspects of Kahn, he is a Storm Warrior, which I already have some sort of idea as to what I'll do with his lore.
